AboutUsData.Title: About
AboutUsData.Subject: Let Us Be Your Partners Preferred Online Partner
AboutUsData.Desc: We are introducing integrated services through a One-Stop-Portal, enriching our clients’ lifestyle and optimizing their daily spend. We offer a wide variety of service provider options that guarantee a tailored service at your preferred convenience, the time of your choosing and the price that suits you.

AboutData.Subject: Convenience
AboutData.Body: Our wide selection of service providers enables you to order and schedule the service at the time of your choosing

AboutData.Subject: Price Guarantee
AboutData.Body: Ordering through Orion guarantees you a lower listed price by a service provider than if ordered directly through the service provider

AboutData.Subject: Quality
AboutData.Body: We guarantee quality satisfaction through our wide network. We re-perform the service for you if it is not up to your satisfaction through the service provider of your choice at no extra cost or your money back

We deliver excellence in providing a smart market place for services with the utmost focus on sustainable cost-efficient work-flows while being led by innovative technology, satisfying the needs and exceeding the expectations of our customers, business partners and all other stakeholders.
Become the optimum go-to smart market place App for services. Helping people live a better and easier life.
